name: Real Bowling 3D - by EivaaGames
description:
Play the best sport game in amazing realistic 3D graphics.

3 Game Modes:
Single Player
Pass n Play
VS. CPU

Features:
● 16 unique bowling balls.
● 3 Game Modes.
● Customize the alley by choosing the wood and background mask you like.
● Realistic Physics.
● Stunning 3D graphics.
● Realistic sound effects.
● Game Center Support.
● Each Player can choose their own ball or set to play with random ball.
● Stats Screen.
